title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions: Introducing the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster, the ultimate solution for insect infestations! Each pack comes with 30 feet of pre-baited, ready-to-use, scented green adhesive barn paper sheets. The non-toxic, disposable traps are effective for up to a full year and cover a generous 3600 square inches. Suitable for indoor and outdoor use in residential, commercial, industrial, barn, waste room, and animal farm settings, this intelligent pest management approach is perfect for damp or humid conditions. Say goodbye to pesky bugs with Catchmaster!

Introducing the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster, the ultimate solution for indoor and outdoor insect infestation! The scented green color and non-toxic formula make it safe for use in residential, commercial, and industrial settings, as well as barns, waste rooms, and animal farms. Designed to be effective in damp and humid conditions, this trap offers intelligent pest management that lasts for up to one full year. Say goodbye to pesky insects and hello to a bug-free environment with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster.
